LanguageData.RC2_Vodka.label: vodka
LanguageData.RC2_Vodka.description: Vodka is a clear distilled beverage most often made from fermented potatoes. Thousands of flavors exist, but they all serve one main purpose: To get the imbiber completely shitfaced drunk.
